import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { connectInstagramPage, disconnectInstagramPage, deleteInstagramPage, makeOwnerInstagramPage, connectFacebookPage, disconnectFacebookPage,makeOwnerFacebookPage, getFbData, getInstaData } from '../../../redux/actions/socialMediaActions'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, Modal, } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Lottie from 'react-lottie'; import animationData from '../../../assets/json/loadingSpinner.json'; import { IoIosClose } from 'react-icons/io'; const DISC_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/home/disconnected-icon.png'); const CONN_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/home/connected-icon.png'); const DELETE_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/home/delete_trash.png'); const USER_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/home/user.png'); const INSTA_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/home/insta-icon.png'); const FB_ICON = require('../../../assets/images/home/fb-icon.png'); function PageCard(props) { /* ALL PROPS { platform={"fb"} isConnectedPage={page.isConnected} namePage={page.name} idPage={page.idPage} picture={null} accessToken={page.access_token} status={key} } */ const defaultOptions = { loop: true, autoplay: true, animationData: animationData, rendererSettings: { preserveAspectRatio: 'xMidYMid slice' } }; const location = useLocation(); const fbHost = "https://graph.facebook.com/v8.0"; const [fbGraphData,setFbGraphData] = useState(null); const [instaGraphData,setInstaGraphData] = useState(null); const [showPopoverConnect, setShowPopoverConnect] = useState(false); const [showDisconnectModal, setShowDisconnectModal] = useState(false); const [showModalTeam,setShowModalTeam] = useState(false); const handleDisconnectModal = () => setShowDisconnectModal(!showDisconnectModal); const handleConnectPopover = () => setShowPopoverConnect(!showPopoverConnect); const checkOwner = () => { let userData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userData')); // search id facebook du user: userData.user.idFacebook in props.admins : const found = props.admins.find(admin => admin.idFacebook === userData.user.idFacebook && admin.role === "owner"); // console.log("i checked the owner from pageCard checkOwner => ",found); return found; }; const renderPopover = () => (
props.platform === "insta" && !props.isConnectedPage ? props.connectInstagramPage(props.idPage) : props.platform === "insta" && props.isConnectedPage ? setShowDisconnectModal(true) : props.platform === "fb" && !props.isConnectedPage ? props.connectFacebookPage(props.idPage) : setShowDisconnectModal(true) } > {props.isConnectedPage ?

Disconnect

:

Connect

}
) const renderDisconnectModal = (idPage) => (
{ props.picture !== null ? : fbGraphData !== null ? : }

{props.namePage}

 {!showModalTeam ?
setShowModalTeam(true)}>

Make Owner

props.platform === "insta" ? props.disconnectInstagramPage(idPage) : props.disconnectFacebookPage(idPage) } >

Disconnect

props.platform === "insta" ? props.deleteInstagramPage(idPage) : props.disconnectFacebookPage(idPage)}>

Delete

 : {props.team.length > 0 ? props.team.map(member =>
props.platform === "insta" ? props.makeOwnerInstagramPage(idPage,member.idFacebook) : props.makeOwnerFacebookPage(idPage,member.idFacebook)} style={{ border: '1px solid black', cursor: 'pointer' }} className="mt-5">

{member.first_name}

{member.last_name}

{member.idFacebook}

) :
No team for this page
} }
); useEffect(() => { if(props.platform === "fb") { axios.get(`${fbHost}/${props.idPage}/?fields=fan_count,picture,new_like_count&access_token=${props.accessToken}`) .then(res => { setFbGraphData(res.data); }) .catch(err => { console.log("PageCardFb",(err)) }) } else { // INSTA axios.get(`${fbHost}/${props.idPage}/?fields=id,media,followers_count,media_count,profile_picture_url,username,name&access_token=${props.accessToken}`) .then(res => { setInstaGraphData(res.data); }) .catch(err => { console.log("PageCard Insta",(err)) }) }; }, []) return ( /* if clicked border: 1px solid red; */ props.status === "listPageConnectedOtherTeam" ?
{ props.picture !== null ? : fbGraphData !== null ? : }

{props.namePage}

This page is managed by another team

: fbGraphData !== null ?

: }

}

{/* Disconnect Modal */} {renderDisconnectModal(props.idPage)} {/* Connect / Disconnect popover */} {showPopoverConnect && renderPopover()} { location.pathname === "/home/pages" && checkOwner() && } { props.picture !== null ? : fbGraphData !== null ? : }

Posts

}
) }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { socialMediaPageSelected : state.socialMediaR.socialMediaPageSelected, } }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { connectInstagramPage,disconnectInstagramPage,deleteInstagramPage,makeOwnerInstagramPage, connectFacebookPage, disconnectFacebookPage,makeOwnerFacebookPage, getFbData, getInstaData })(PageCard);
